— CASH PAYMENT PREFERRED ——

We take pride in preparing our food from scratch every day. Some items will have limited availability.

We are concerned for your well-being. If you have allergies, please alert us as not all ingredients are listed!

GF* are items that can be prepared gluten free.

*Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness.

We only serve USDA Choice or higher Angus Beef.

18% gratuity added to parties of 6 or more.

To ensure outstanding service, a portion of your gratuity is shared with fellow service staff members.

Cash payments preferred. 3% processing fee added to all credit card transactions, cash payments are processed with no fee.

Description: Classic American fare, international dishes & drinks are offered in a welcoming setting.

summary.snippet: "Now the dish, I ordered the chicken pecan with veggies and a loaded potato."
"The price was commencerit to the quality of food and service."
"Great atmosphere, menu and tasty drink options (need better beer options tho)."

most_relevant.description: It was my first time at Carlyle Grill in Ann Arbor, Michigan. The ambiance was great, there was plenty of parking, and the service was fast. I ordered the Chicken Avocado Club on a gluten-free bun, and my husband had the Classic Cheeseburger on a gluten-free bun. The menu indicated that items marked "GF" could be prepared gluten-free. From what I recall, only the burgers and sandwiches had the "GF" designation, otherwise, I would have ordered something else. The food was good and tasty, with generous portions, though it was a bit pricier compared to other places.
Was no wait when we went, our waiter was very polite and attentive, the food was very good. I got the Carlyle Mac and Cheese and the Strawberry Lemon Drop to drink.

I don't like to hand out five stars very often, and definitely not in all categories. Carlyle Grill consistently hits the mark. I have never been disappointed. The menu has something for everyone, and everything is prepared superbly. From the staff to the food to the ambiance, very well done.

I love, love, LOVE this restaurant! The food is amazing, fresh, farm-to-table and perfectly prepared. They have so many excellent options, it’s hard to choose what to get. When the brussel sprouts are in season they are to die for. The service is wonderful. I can’t find anything wrong with this place.

I ate Thanksgiving dinner with my son’s girlfriend today, and it was absolutely fantastic! We were seated right on time for our reservation. The food was incredible (we upgraded to salmon), wonderful and cozy family style, our server was very attentive and helpful, even though the place was packed. Great atmosphere and perfect for a Thanksgiving occasion! Thank you for great experience!

The experience was swell. The atmosphere was welcoming. The lighting and spacing was just right for a comfortable evening out. Now the dish, I ordered the chicken pecan with veggies and a loaded potato. In which, everything was tasteful, well cooked, and nicely presented. The chicken and the veggies had my type of crunch. Lastly, salute to the waiter, who was great. Good energy, humor, and she had us covered. Yeah, I cleaned the plate. 🤟🏾

This place was great! We were in the area (Auto Mall) and went in for lunch. Great food, great cocktails - and the waitress offered us free carrot cake since we were first time guests! They do say "cash preferred", you can save a little on the bill if you don't use a CC.

Very fresh tasting food and good drinks. Happy hour is 3 to 6 pm and the happy hour menu has a variety of drinks and food options. Staff very kind. Sweet potato fries were delicious and black bean quesdilla was so crispy and yummy.
